mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car WHERE car_model LIKE CONCAT('%', #{carModel}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (car_id, car_model, img_name, car_price, car_reg_date) VALUES (#{carId},#{carModel},#{imgName},#{carPrice}, #{carRegDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET car_price=#{carPrice},img_name=#{imgName} WHERE car_id=#{carId}
